title: Networking Basics
description: Knowledge of networks, devices, IP addressing, transport and applications; practiced building a home wireless network.

title: Junior Cybersecurity Analyst Career Path
description: Skills to monitor and protect networks, handle security alerts, perform vulnerability assessments and create risk management plans.

title: Networking Devices and Initial Configuration
description: Configured Cisco devices, calculated IP schemes, and tested network connectivity; completed labs and Packet Tracer activities.

title: CyberOps Associate
description: Understanding of Security Operations; skills to detect, analyze intrusions, and monitor networks using labs and Packet Tracer.

title: Network Defense
description: Understanding techniques to monitor and protect networks and skills to evaluate and respond to security alerts.

title: Endpoint Security
description: Understanding basic concepts of network, OS, and endpoint security.

title: Ethical Hacker
description: Proficient in vulnerability assessments, reporting, and recommending mitigation strategies; completed hands-on activities.

title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
description: Introductory knowledge of cybersecurity, threats, vulnerabilities, defense, and career insights.
